WorkItem.Description:
When a RibbonGroup collapse because the window was resized, the binding appears to die.
 
Reproduce the issue :
 
1. Execute the test
2. Write a name in the textbox
3. Click "Shout", you see a popup containing the name.
4. Resize the window in order to the Name-Button group to collapse.
5. Click the group button to open the group-context-menu
6. Enter a different name
7. Click "Shout", the 1st name is shown.
